PIXI.brend.BatchRenderer.generateCompositeGeometry (attributeRedirects, hasIndex, textureAttribute, texturePerObject) static

BatchRenderer.js:362

Generates a PIXI.Geometry that can be used for rendering multiple display objects at once.

Name Type Description

whether to include an index property
textureAttribute string
